name: Woodstock 1969
detailed_description:
Woodstock— was a music festival in the United States in 1969 which attracted an audience of more than 400,000. Scheduled for August 15–17 on a dairy farm in the Catskill Mountains of southern New York State.

In this novella you will learn how one concert changed the whole life of the main character Cathy. Make a choice for her and change the fate of Cathy.

Features

  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • Nonlinear text with different storylines;
  • Drastic story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible card

  • Processor: 3.0 GHz

  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible card
